name: pnp-sp-fx-aces-promote-pages
title: Promote Pages ACE
shortDescription: This Adaptive Card Extension shows the most recent pages on selected SharePoint sites and allows you to promote a page as a news post.
longDescription: This Adaptive Card Extension shows the most recent pages on selected SharePoint sites and allows you to promote a page as a news post.

references.name: Viva Connections Extensibility guidance
references.description: Adaptive Card Extensions are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page.
